official_title: A bill to assist counties in providing public library services in small communities.
short_title: Small Community Library Services Assistance Act

summary.text: Small Community Library Services Assistance Act - Directs the Secretary of Education to make grants to assist counties in providing public library services in small communities. Sets forth provisions relating to applications, approval, payments, records, and withholding of such grant payments. Authorizes appropriations to carry out this Act.

titles.title: Small Community Library Services Assistance Act
A bill to assist counties in providing public library services in small communities.
